quota.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: an official limit on the number or amount of something that is allowed in a particular period
quota.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The government has decided to scrap quotas on car imports.
There are plans to introduce strict immigration quotas.
The government has imposed quotas on the export of timber.
Several countries have now set quotas for cod fishing.
quota.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: an amount of something that someone is expected to do or achieve
quota.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Workers only get paid if they make their quota.
They’re worried that they won’t achieve this year’s sales quota.
Each person was given a quota of tickets to sell.
In the 1990s the Navy couldn’t fill its quota for new recruits.
quota.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: an amount of something that you think is fair, right, or normal
quota.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: The committee has had more than its quota of problems.
I think I’ve had my quota of coffee for the day.
quota.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: a particular number of votes that someone needs to get to be elected in an election
quota.translation[0].note_box[0].section: In 1993 the European Union imposed quotas on banana imports.
They have the right to set fishing quotas.
The minister for trade lifted all quotas on imports and exports.
The fishermen were accused of exceeding their quotas.
Five countries maintained national quotas on imports of Japanese cars.
The fishing quotas are strictly enforced.
With an excess of milk in the European Union, production quotas were imposed on dairy farmers.
British industry was sheltered from foreign competition by higher tariffs and import quotas.
The US immigration laws imposed a strict annual quota for each country of origin.
quota.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: an amount of something that is officially allowed or expected in a particular period of time
quota.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The U.S. has for years imposed quotas on Chinese garment imports.
France enforces an import quota of 3% of total car sales.
a meeting of OPEC to discuss production quotas
Salesmen selling over their quota receive a $1000 bonus.
